EmailTemplate.name: 2019_EMEAI_Ops_Forum_Johannesburg_Irina.201902_EMEAI_Invite_Operators_Conference
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to join the Honeywell Operators Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS FORUM-Johannesburg Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Forum. Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: March 19th, 2019 Location: Southern Sun Montecasino, Montecasino Blvd, Fourways, Johannesburg
Agenda:
Time Subject
09:00 - 09:30 Registration
09:30 - 10:00 Introduction & Agenda Review
10:00 - 10:15 Guest Speaker
10:15 - 10:25 Break
10:25 - 11:25 Honeywell Customer & Product Support Updates
11:25 - 11:45 Break
11:45 - 12:45 GoDirect
13:00 - 13:15 Guest Speaker
13:15 - 14:15 Lunch
14:15 - 15:15 Maintenance Support Programs
15:15 - 15:25 Break
15:25 - 16:10 ATS Technical Updates
16:10 - 16:30 Break
16:30 - 17:15 Mandates (RMUs, ADS-B, FMS, etc.)
17:15 - 17:30 Closing
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_EMEAI_Operators_Conference_Johannesburg.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you!
Mohammad Abdo Customer Support Manager
